EmailTemplate.description: Invitation Email sent to sponsored organizations from the sponsorer
EmailTemplate.name: Sponsoring Relationship Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: I Am Inviting You to Become A(n) {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.Affiliation_Type__c} of The Clearing House
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.Executed_By_First_Name__c} {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.Executed_By_Last_Name__c},
I have initiated a sponsoring relationship agreement with the clearing house.
Please review the agreement and make any necessary changes.
You will need to login to the community using your login credentials in order to access the form.
Sincerely, {!Sponsoring_Relationships__c.CreatedBy}
